# kronus
Python program with my own way of representing time as a int number  
Programa en python para representar as datas  
Programa en python para representar las fechas  

----
Example:  
Exemplo:  
Ejemplo:  
2019/07/10 09:55:00:000000  
+20190710095500000000  
\+ 2019 07 10 09 55 00 000000  

-(0)        â†’ a.C                       â†’ 1bit  
or/ou/o  
+(1)        â†’ d.C                       â†’ Same bit/Mesmo bit/Mismo bit  
2019        â†’ year/ano/aÃ±o              â†’ 5bits  
07          â†’ month/mes                 â†’ 2bits  
10          â†’ day/dÃ­a                   â†’ 2bits  
55          â†’ minute/minuto             â†’ 2bits  
00          â†’ second/segundo            â†’ 2bits  
000000      â†’ microsecond/microsegundo  â†’ 6bits
